weka.clusterers

Class MTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.clusterers.AbstractClusterer
      • weka.clusterers.RandomizableClusterer
        • weka.clusterers.MTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.clusterers.Clusterer, weka.clusterers.NumberOfClustersRequestable, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler, weka.core.WeightedInstancesHandler

    public class MTree
extends weka.clusterers.RandomizableClusterer
implements weka.clusterers.NumberOfClustersRequestable, weka.core.WeightedInstancesHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    Clustering algorithm based on MTree data structure.
    See Also:
